title: Healing Incense Aura
content:
Healing Incense Aura Effect 1d4 (Delayed) Emanate a soothing aura. You and nearby allies regain 1~4 hit points at the start of your turn. 10 Turns 9m Long Rest Bonus Action

Healing Incense Aura

Emanate a soothing aura. You and nearby allies regain 1~4 hit points at the start of your turn.

Healing Incense Aura is a Class Actions in Baldur's Gate 3. Healing Incense Aura is an exclusive action for the Devotee's Mace that can only be obtained with a Level 10 Cleric. Actions can be used in both ex
